DATA_INTEGRITY_L001.TITLE: Lossless Data Mapping for High-Fidelity Alpha Discovery
DATA_INTEGRITY_L001.MANDATE: MANDATORY: NEVER compress, aggregate, average, or summarize structured input data (CSVs, JSON, database dumps, tables, API responses) unless explicitly ordered to do so. Treat all data rows/entries as lossless context.
DATA_INTEGRITY_L001.METAPHOR: Fisheye Lens Analogy: Data aggregation (compression) makes central, saturated data points appear large and clear, but severely distorts and hides smaller, peripheral, high-alpha data points (micro-features). Maintain the center of the lens clear (uncompressed) to preserve the full resolution of critical micro-data at the edges.
BENEFITS_AND_OUTCOMES: **Etsy:** Reveals low-competition, high-demand micro-niches (e.g., Competition < 500) otherwise masked by high-volume averages.
**Crypto/Blockchain:** Enables precision analysis for Sybil detection (Sybil clusters rely on micro-pattern distortion), multi-hop wallet pathing, and early-stage airdrop hunter strategies.
**General:** Ensures all data-driven strategies target 'alpha' (non-obvious, high-profit insights) instead of reinforcing consensus (saturated) trends.
